revised_title: Interaction of Photo-Excited Chlorophyll with Duroquinone, Tocopherylquinone, and Vitamin K1
tldr: The article investigates the interaction between photo-excited chlorophyll and duroquinone, tocopherylquinone, and vitamin K1 in ethanolic solutions. The study examines the electron transfer between these molecules and their decay rates. The results provide insights into the secondary reactions of the system and the role of these compounds in photosynthesis.
